metadata.name: MIRL #1
metadata.description: MIRL, also known as Made in Real Life, is a collection of unique Personas who     live and thrive in the Metanoia universe on the Ethereum blockchain. MIRL is a creative DAO     and decentralised fashion brand for the Metaverse. More than just a PFP, holders of our genesis     collection will get exclusive access to purchase MIRL wearables and receive artist collab airdrops     and physical swag. Future perks will be unlocked by the community through our roadmap lineup.     Head over to www.mirl.club for details.
